settings.image_text_content:
It’s not only about using natural and organic ingredients. It’s about the quality of those ingredients.

That’s why we scour the earth for legendary, time-honored superfood ingredients that offer the highest quality and performance in our superb formulations. Via thorough research and evaluation, we hand select the best of the best, plant & fruit-based ingredients to use in our unique, handcrafted products.

At ST. TROPICA, we are obsessed with gorgeous, healthy hair and passionate about clean, nontoxic beauty... that is not only better for our customers, but also our animal friends, and the fragile environment we all share. We go to great lengths to offer natural & organic products that are free from harmful and animal-derived ingredients, and free from any form of animal testing; with a focus on earth friendliness, and conscientious sourcing.

When you use ST. TROPICA natural hair products, you are giving your hair the very best.

It's the ultimate daily Hair Vitamin for extraordinary results.

settings.image_text_content:
Spanning from rural ancient India, to the depths of the Brazilian rainforest, to the lush tropical Hawaiian Islands… we’ve scoured the Earth in our quest to source the best of the best, high performance, plant and fruit-based ingredients for our Hair Growth Vitamins.

We had one goal in mind … Maximum Hair Growth. Think of this formula as our ultimate ingredient wish list, realized! Each ingredient in our exclusive design has been hand-selected regardless of cost to create the World’s Best Hair Vitamin, rigorously researched and evaluated for efficacy and safety, measured against the Skin Deep database, and cross-checked against WebMD for side effects.

Longer, Stronger, Thicker Hair starts at the root. Our new Tru Bloom Hair Growth Shampoo is made with Natural and Scientifically Proven ingredients like Biotin, Saw Palmetto, Red Ginseng, Peppermint Oil, Green Tea, Caffeine & more to:

  • Stimulate and condition your Scalp
  • Fortify and energize your Hair Follicles – for accelerated Hair Growth and Hair Density. Think of it as both a deep Scalp Detox and a Superfood “Fertilizer” for Hair Growth.

It’s also a Silicone-Free, Super Natural Shampoo that outperforms them all – even Conventional Shampoos. Expect a deep, rich emollient lather, a cleansing & conditioning experience like no other, an addictive creamy Peppermint-dream scent, and the silkiest, softest, most hydrated hair you’ve ever known. It will completely transform your hair and scalp with the very first use, or your money back: with our exclusive 100 Day Money Back Guarantee.

Longer, Stronger, Thicker Hair starts at the root. Our new Tru Bloom Hair Growth Conditioner is made with Natural and Scientifically Proven ingredients like Biotin, Saw Palmetto, Red Ginseng, Peppermint Oil, Green Tea, Caffeine & more to:

  • Stimulate and condition your Scalp
  • Fortify and energize your Hair Follicles – for accelerated Hair Growth and Hair Density. Think of it as both a deep Scalp Detox and a Superfood “Fertilizer” for Hair Growth.

It’s also a Silicone-Free, Super Natural Conditioner that outperforms them all – even Conventional Conditioners. Expect a rich, emollient conditioning experience like no other, an addictive creamy Peppermint-dream scent, and the silkiest, softest, most hydrated hair you’ve ever known. It will completely transform your hair and scalp with the very first use, or your money back: with our exclusive 100 Day Money Back Guarantee.

Get dramatically Thicker, Fuller Hair in just seconds! Simply spray our amazing Mermaid Mist through damp hair to instantly create Thicker, Fuller, more Voluminous locks, with a subtle hold that can last day or night. Exotic Himalayan Pink Salt enhances volume & texture, Sea Kelp Extract helps strengthen strands, and Argan Oil moisturizes & protects against damage. These three hair ingredient all-stars combine with our renowned Hair Superfood formula to leave hair looking and feeling better than ever before.

Deeply infused with the world’s most sought after Hair Superfoods, our Hair Mask is a powerhouse formula of raw and unrefined hair vitamins and nutrients. Our carefully selected rare ingredients nurture and repair strands, encourage hair growth, and help prevent breakage by sealing the cuticle layer. A botanical blend that delivers on gorgeously healthy hair and a heavenly tropical scent.

We’ve carefully crafted Luscious Locks with select Exotic Hair Superfoods, including potent herbs long used in Ayurveda, and Pure Organic Oils to ensure our Leave-In Conditioner delivers high-intensity results with ingredients from nature.

Our one-of-a-kind formula locks in moisture and nourishes each strand, providing long-lasting benefits to hair. As an added bonus, our natural fragrance ingredients offer a sublime tropical scent you’ll love. Each and every ingredient used to create Luscious Locks ranks #1 on EWG Skin Deep for safety.

  • Organic Jojoba Oil makes hair feel silky smooth and soft
  • Organic Virgin Olive Oil makes hair feel thicker and healthier
  • Organic Avocado Oil lends the appearance of voluminous hair
  • Organic Bhringraj prevents the appearance of hair loss and visibly improves hair growth
  • Organic Hibiscus offers a soothing feel to skin, ideal for those with sensitive scalp
  • Organic Amla moisturizes the scalp and makes hair feel strong
  • Organic Horsetail lends a reparative feel to damaged hair tissue, and makes hair look healthy and vibrant
  • Organic Green Tea boosts the appearance of hair growth and visibly improves split ends
